thread.section_title: PRO ISP omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av PRO ISP | www.proisp.no
thread.title: Andrzej Giedrojć
thread.title_full: PRO ISP anmeldt av Andrzej Giedrojć

author: Andrzej Giedrojć
title: Andrzej Giedrojć
text:
Hi. I have hosting here, and it works fine to time when i bought second domain, and want to host it on the same sever. It costs 96NOK/year + domain cost.
I have many hostings all over the world but nobody, block addon domains, mails, etc, and nobody takes money for that. Its like paying for email access.
